overview.description: Gujarat, located on India's western coast, is known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and diverse landscapes, from the Rann of Kutch to the Gir Forest. Established as a state on May 1, 1960, it is a hub of trade and tourism.

top_destinations.name: Rann of Kutch
top_destinations.description: A vast salt desert hosting the annual Rann Utsav festival.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Attend Rann Utsav; carry warm clothing.

top_destinations.name: Ahmedabad
top_destinations.description: A historic city with UNESCO-listed Sabarmati Ashram and vibrant markets.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Visit Sabarmati Ashram; explore local food stalls.

top_destinations.name: Gir National Park
top_destinations.description: The last refuge of the Asiatic lion with diverse wildlife.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Book a safari in advance; carry binoculars.

accommodation.name: The Fern Gir Forest Resort
accommodation.description: Premium resort near Gir National Park.

accommodation.name: Hotel President
accommodation.description: Comfortable stay in Rann of Kutch area.

culinary_delights.name: The Green House
culinary_delights.description: Offers a variety of dishes with a scenic view.

culinary_delights.name: Curry Pot
culinary_delights.description: Offers a range of spicy dishes.

culinary_delights.name: Cafe Coffee Day
culinary_delights.description: Cozy spot for coffee and snacks.

must_visit_spots.name: Sabarmati Ashram
must_visit_spots.description: A historic site where Mahatma Gandhi lived.
must_visit_spots.tip: Visit the museum for a deeper insight.

must_visit_spots.name: Dwarka
must_visit_spots.description: A sacred town with the Dwarkadhish Temple.
must_visit_spots.tip: Visit during Janmashtami for a festive vibe.

must_visit_spots.name: Somnath Temple
must_visit_spots.description: An ancient Shiva temple on the coast.

must_visit_spots.name: Statue of Unity
must_visit_spots.description: The world's tallest statue honoring Sardar Patel.
must_visit_spots.tip: Book a boat ride for a closer view.

must_visit_spots.name: Bhuj
must_visit_spots.description: A cultural hub near the Great Rann of Kutch.
must_visit_spots.tip: Explore the Aina Mahal and local handicrafts.

must_visit_spots.name: Jamnagar
must_visit_spots.description: Known for the Lakhota Lake and marine national park.
must_visit_spots.tip: Visit the Bala Hanuman Temple for peace.

travel_essentials.how_to_reach: By road: Ahmedabad is 500 km from Mumbai (NH48, 8-10 hrs). By train: Ahmedabad Junction connects major cities. By air: Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Airport (Ahmedabad).
travel_essentials.tips: Carry light clothing; respect religious sites.
travel_essentials.nearby_destinations: Rann of Kutch (300 km), Gir (400 km)
